[{'company': {'id': 1090, 'name': 'Philips', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C510BAQG4O5wCG6zf2Q/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855869410?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=nckPFFIatOW5k72Vbjusy3ph4jMtjVRp2GpRIrfF8Es', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/philips/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Responsible for the High End Electric toothbrush propositions (Sonicare Diamond Clean Smart and Prestige 9900) and for developing and launching new breakthrough innovations.', 'title': 'Senior Global Consumer Marketing Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amsterdam Area', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Globally responsible for Philips Avent Infant Feeding and Toddler Drinking category (leading a team of 6), with focus on global portfolio strategy definition, mid-long term innovation roadmap (incl. new business models), Innovation-to-Market program, development and launch of ground-breaking innovations, P&L financial performances management.', 'title': 'Consumer Marketing Director a.i.', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amsterdam, North Holland, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Responsibilities: Portfolio management for the Infant Feeding portfolio
In charge of financial and competitive performance of product range | Strategy creation and execution | Product development | Pricing strategy | Performance in terms of ratings and reviews | SKU & stock management and cost down activities 

Main activities include:
- Support Infant Feeding Roadmap creation (including claims roadmap)
- Leading new product development projects including VPC, AD, PDLM
- Core part of Integral Value Proposition project within Mother & Child Care
- Owner of strategic portfolio business case for the Infant Feeding category to support Roadmap decisions
- Market potential assessment and business case development for cost/revenue analyses
- Supporting consumer research and home placement test for identification for new product development 
- Cooperation with the Clinical Marketing team in order to secure communications towards healthcare professionals

Results:
- Roadmap created for Infant Feeding category 
- Strategic portfolio business case approved ensuring NPI global launch plan and roll-out 
- Completed multi-phased consumer research in China to identify potential of new product concept and closed related Value Proposition Creation project', 'title': 'Senior Global Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Main activities include:
- Leading new product development projects including VPC, AD, PDLM
- Market potential assessment and business case development for cost/revenue analyses
- Establishing timelines with various functions including production and supply chain
- Responsible for creation and coordination of the global market activation plans and go-to-market strategy for new products launches
- Supporting consumer research and home placement test for identification for new product development 
- Market competition assessment and product benchmarking

Results:
- Led a strategic End-to-End project with the North American market, leading to the launch of a new to the world proposition including 90+ new SKUs globally. The launch helped in reverting the declining trend of the range, and was brought to life in a record timeline (highlights: +18% sales increase in NAM after YoY decline, and significant market share gains in both NAM and DACH)
- Led the repositioning of an entire product range globally (200+ SKUs)', 'title': 'Global Consumer Marketing Manager', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'Philips', 'description': 'Responsibilities:

Results:
